welcome.title: Welcome to ML Maze Quest!
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-Powered Machine Learning Adventure
welcome.hint: Your brave name for this ML journey

instructor.title: Meet Your Guide
instructor.introduction: "Welcome, {{name}}! I'm Miss Hootsworth, your guide through the fascinating world of Machine Learning!"

instructions.title: Game Instructions
instructions.controls: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to navigate the maze
instructions.objective: Answer quiz questions to collect keys and reach the goal
instructions.topics: Choose from various ML topics, each with multiple levels
instructions.lives: You have 3 lives. Incorrect answers or failed levels cost a life
instructions.learning: Study material appears before each level to help you learn
instructions.progression: Complete easier levels to unlock harder ones

instructor.letsBegin: Let's Begin Your ML Learning Adventure!
